Name: Izanami's Dream Battle
About the game: Izanami becomes bored with her usual sitting around the house, shut-in, lifestyle. And so, her friends Eione, Florine, and Lauressa decide to show her a magical stone from their homeland, with the power to turn her thoughts into reality. Izanami then begins to bring life to her own Danmaku! (Also known as a Bullet Hell) She then leaves ships behind for the three sisters to chase after her, with a note, declaring her desire to take over the moon! This is a parody game featuring: - 3 playable characters - 1 hidden character - 4 difficulties - 5 levels - 1 unlockable bonus level - built in level editor! - Soundtrack via DLC Other features include highscore, music room and practice modes.
